body(bytes29).notice: Returns message's body field as bytes29 (refer to TypedMemView library for details on bytes29 type)

messageHash(uint32,bytes32,uint32,uint32.notice: Returns leaf of formatted message with provided fields.

recipient(bytes29).notice: Returns message's recipient field as bytes32

recipientAddress(bytes29).notice: Returns message's recipient field as an address

params._recipient: Address of recipient on destination chain as bytes32
